block.p: WADLER-Julius. Beloved husband of Marlene, devoted father of Andrew, daughter-in-law Nora, and daughters Jane and Pamela. Loving grandfather to Robert and Rebecca. Survived by sisters Ettie Krumbein, Sandy Chesir and brother Joel Wadler. Founder of the Y.I. of Jamaica Estates and the Queens Jewish Community Council, as well a tireless advocate for Israeli causes, Jewish education and charities.
